channel.title: Hot] RevolutionPK [/HOT] :D
channel.description:
Whatsup everybody, im here to announce that what we all been waiting for is now released, RevolutionPK !
We have boosted the exp rates to 600x, but keep in mind that the max level is now 255, yes you heard right 255 .. :)
To reach 255 stat you need 2.1bil of exp, we also added alot of awesome training spots.
We have custom armour, weapons, and even a custom godspell called Claws of revolution hitting 60s, but you need 190 magic to charge it and 60 to cast it. This is based on EasyRSC source, so just login with any username or password. Keep in mind you cant have spaces in your name, we'll fix that later. :)
http://www.mediafire.com/?jjzo0yyoled

item.title: Hot] RevolutionPK [/HOT] :D
item.dc:creator: @weenor weenor
item.description:
@weenor wrote:

[quote=“Kozy, post:39, topic:280305”]Someone’s a hardass. I like how you can twist my words around, in an attempt to be funny, but yet that makes you so immature, it’s just childish. Oh, and I think I should get a medal, as most people these days are utterly lazy, and make no attempt in school, and yes, there is respect in the RSC Scene, most people in here do respect Reines,xEnt,K09,Stork, all the big server developers. Oh, and did I ever once call myself a hardass because I put my name at the end of my posts? Uhhm… don’t think so? I do it because I am used to it, from other boards/communities, which are none of your business. Hop back on your wanna be “Leet” train, and ride it all the way back to Niggerville, learn the English language please, fucking butcher.

-Kozy[/quote]
i thought it was funny… i got a few laughs out of it mr closet case:) you think i care if im immature? im 15 bitch i do what i want your oppinion dont matter… yea you would think that you would deserve a medal … too bad theres people my age in college and your not the brightest outta the brightest… uhhh buddy you said you knew 10 … and stork hardly counts as one anymore nor does reines really… so that leaves 2 … 8 more to go… did he ever say he was a badass because he puts his comments in steps … DIDNT THINK SOOOO… and how about you hop off everyones dick and fuckin live a lil u piece of shit racist you dont deserve to be in the same train as me cuz you aint nearly as badass as you think you are fuckin closet case.

oh and btw mr fuckin perfect … you use WAY to many commas… so many comma splices in there its rediculious…

you aint the only one with an education fuckin closet case…
